code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{numberWithCommas}from'../utils/formats';import'../App.css';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';var ProfitLoss=function ProfitLoss(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amount=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=amount.filter(function(item){return item>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);var expenses=(amount.filter(function(item){return item<0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0)*-1).toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"inc-exp-container container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Income"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money plus",id:"money-plus"}," +$",numberWithCommas(income)," ")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Expenses"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money minus",id:"money-minus"}," -$",numberWithCommas(expenses)," ")));};export default ProfitLoss;
